title: Paysafe card not responding
body: soi want to buy somr rp points with paysafe...hoever when i try to select the amount i want to buy it does nothing. Nomraly it should popup a window with the code i need to enter and etc....yet nothing is hapening , it's not laging or giving me an error. So...i wonder if any1 knows how to fix this. I tryed to click on other payments and they work fine but this one isn't.

replies.body:
After restarting your PC, does this still happen? If so, I'd recommend working through our [Store Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660), as it commonly resolves issues inside of the store.

Let me know if this caused any change.
it actualy solve out by it's onw with the new alpha update....but thank you for ur reply anyway
